overview: This is a complex system consisting of multiple microservices, including authentication, language modeling, graph analytics, and UI components. Each service is designed to perform specific functions, and they interact with each other to provide a comprehensive solution.

docs.title: Getting Started Guide
docs.description: This document provides a step-by-step guide for developers to get started with the project, including setting up the development environment, understanding the project structure, and running the application.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with JavaScript, TypeScript, and React
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive guide for developers to get started with the project

docs.title: System Architecture
docs.description: This document provides an overview of the system architecture, including the interactions between the microservices, data flows, and core workflows.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with system architecture and microservices
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive understanding of the system architecture

docs.title: Authentication Service
docs.description: This document provides a detailed overview of the authentication service, including its features, functionality, and implementation details.
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive understanding of the authentication service

docs.title: Language Modeling Service
docs.description: This document provides a detailed overview of the language modeling service, including its features, functionality, and implementation details.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with language modeling and natural language processing
examples: Overview of the language modeling service
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive understanding of the language modeling service

docs.title: Graph Analytics Service
docs.description: This document provides a detailed overview of the graph analytics service, including its features, functionality, and implementation details.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with graph analytics and data visualization
examples: Overview of the graph analytics service
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive understanding of the graph analytics service

docs.title: UI Service
docs.description: This document provides a detailed overview of the UI service, including its features, functionality, and implementation details.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with React and front-end development
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive understanding of the UI service

docs.title: APIs and Interfaces
docs.description: This document provides a detailed overview of the APIs and interfaces used by the microservices, including their endpoints, parameters, and response formats.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with RESTful APIs and interface design
examples: Overview of the APIs and interfaces
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive understanding of the APIs and interfaces

docs.title: Integration Guidelines
docs.description: This document provides guidelines for integrating the microservices, including best practices for API design, data flow, and error handling.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with microservices integration and API design
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive guide for integrating the microservices

docs.title: Component Interaction Diagrams
docs.description: This document provides diagrams illustrating the interactions between the microservices, including data flows and core workflows.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with system architecture and microservices
examples: Diagrams illustrating the interactions between the microservices
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive understanding of the component interactions

docs.title: Implementation Patterns and Use Cases
docs.description: This document provides examples of implementation patterns and use cases for the microservices, including best practices for development and deployment.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with software development and deployment
examples: Examples of implementation patterns and use cases
Best practices for development and deployment
docs.goal: To provide a comprehensive guide for implementation and deployment
